text: I see that, in Firefox it takes 1 sec to disappear. On the other hand you might have to resize the form for smaller screens, because in 13" laptops overlays with the menu
Iâ€™ve realised that you have 2 classes assigned: container2 and display-container2. This is what is causing overlaping. If you use only the last mentioned should be fine.
Does anyone know if there is a maximum amount of products for the product library?
not entirely sure, but I constantly reference this doc for current limits on things: <https://legal.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-product-and-services-catalog#TechnicalLimits>
